articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Newly-Built Fish Meal Fodder Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Newly-Built Fish Meal Fodder Factory
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the Fish Meal Fodder Factory newly built by the KPA. 
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of the factory, he said that a foundation was laid for producing and supplying the fish meal fodder necessary for breeding fish and it opened up a prospect for carrying out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who made so much efforts for improving the diet of the service personnel and people by developing fish breeding.
					
					 The appearance of the factory alone proves that a lot of efforts were made with strong determination, he said, noting with great satisfaction that its builders demonstrated once again the work style and mettle of the People's Army in implementing the behests of the leaders and the party's policy on developing fish breeding.
					
					 After being briefed before a map showing a panoramic view of the factory, he went round its various places to learn in detail about production there.
					
					 He said that it was good that the factory was producing varieties of fish meal fodder for sturgeon, rainbow-trout and others with tiny shrimp, sand launce, anchovy and hard-finned sandfish.
					
					 Noting that the People's Army was taking the lead in locally producing fish food, he stressed that the construction of the factory made it possible to breed fishes of various species in a big way with fish meal fodder produced by it.
					
					 He set forth the tasks before the factory.
					
					 Underlining the need to pay deep attention to the work for updating the factory and establishing cultured practice in production and life at a higher level, he said it should reinforce modern equipment and put fish selection, processing, packing and conveyance on a streamlined and unmanned basis and turn its compound into a thick woodland and greenery. 
					
					 He stressed the need to regularly supply fishes for the production of fodder in order to keep the factory operating in full capacity and take a thorough measure to prevent fodder from going bad. He added that the factory should build up a strong technical force and raise the level of technical skill of its employees to establish a scientific method of producing fish meal fodder.
					
					 Expressing expectation and belief that the employees of the factory would creditably fulfill their duties, he had a photo session with them.

articles.title: NDC Policy Department Clarifies DPRK's Principled Stand on "May 24 Step"
articles.content:
NDC Policy Department Clarifies DPRK's Principled Stand on "May 24 Step"
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are kicking up a noisy racket against the DPRK over the Cheonan warship sinking case which has nothing to do with it.
					 The warship sinking case and the "May 24 step" taken by them in its wake were a vivid manifestation of the anti-reunification acts as they were deliberately cooked up to nullify the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 But the present authorities of south Korea are still spreading the cock-and bull- story that there should be a "change in attitude of the north" such as "admission", "apology", "expression of regret" over the Cheonan case if the "step" is to be lifted.
					
					 They even absurdly call for putting the issue of lifting the "step" on the table.
					
					 A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK issued a statement Monday to clarify its principled stand on the "May 24 step" as follows:
					
					 Firstly, we remain unchanged in our stand that the south has to immediately lift the ill-famed "step" which they cooked up under the absurd pretext of the Cheonan warship sinking case, not dragging on time. This is because the "step" is based on the fictitious story about the north's "involvement in the sinking".
					
					 Lack of just ground will prove any step unreasonable.
					
					 Secondly, the south should clearly understand that its sophism that "apology" and "expression of regret" have to precede the lifting of the "step" can never work.
					
					 Should anyone demand the north "apologize" and attempt to table the "step", that will be regarded as an intolerable mockery of the DPRK and the declaration of stand-off with it.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly wish for the improvement of the north-south relations, they should bear in mind that they have to move first to lift the "step".
					
					 Thirdly, it is the invariable stand of the DPRK to immediately start reinvestigation for the scientific clarification of the truth behind the sinking that resulted in the ill-famed "step", if necessary, though belatedly.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly stand for the settlement of the issue, they should take a bold decision of accepting all the proposals made by the DPRK for the settlement of the issue concerning the sinking.
					
					 If they find it difficult to respond to the DPRK's proposals, they can just bring to Panmunjom or any other places agreed all materials and evidence related to the sinking to just let the DPRK expose roundly before the world the truth behind the case.
					
					 The statement warned that the south Korean authorities should not forget even a moment that if they persist in their vociferous talk about the "May 24 step" by groundlessly linking the sinking case with the DPRK, they will be branded as the second Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and a group of those who are more dead than alive.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Moscow Gives Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Moscow Gives Reception
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- There was a reception at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Mar. 19 on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the government, institutions and organizations of Russia including the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ministry of Economy and Development, Ministry of Development of Far East, Ministry of Finance, Ministry of Culture, Ministry of Education and Science, Chamber of Commerce and Industry, Russian Railways Company, Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences, TASS and Interfax.  
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials were present.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the full-length painting depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Then, they looked round photos on the theme of "Uplifted banner of Songun".
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 There took place a reception at the branch of the consulate general of the DPRK in Khabarovsk on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Back Home
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong came back home Tuesday after winding up its visit to Belarus and Cuba.

articles.title: Leading Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in 7th Meeting of Sportspersons
articles.content:
Leading Officials Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in 7th Meeting of Sportspersons
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission visited the lodging quarters of the participants in the 7th national meeting of sportspersons on Tuesday.
					 Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Phyong Hae, and members of the commission and officials concerned met the participants.
					
					 They congratulated sportspersons and officials who made contributions to developing mass sports and displaying glory of Songun Korea by noble sports spirit, spirit of the nation and high sports technique.
					
					 They requested them to contribute to placing first in every game, making a hot wind of sports sweep across the country and putting the country on the level of sports power as early as possible.

articles.title: Joint Tree-Planting with Russian Embassy Members Held
articles.content:
Joint Tree-Planting with Russian Embassy Members Held
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A joint tree-planting with staff members of the Russian embassy here took place at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site on Tuesday on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there were officials concerned, the Russian ambassador to the DPRK and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants visited President Kim Il Sung's birthplace in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They planted trees around his old home.

articles.title: World TB Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
World TB Day Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to mark the World Tuberculosis Day. 
					 Present there were officials of public health organs, social organizations and media, the representative of WHO and staff members of missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Speakers called upon all people to turn out in a drive for solving the tuberculosis problem in line with the theme of this year set out by the WHO: finding out tuberculosis cases that fell short of being enrolled throughout the world and offering them correct diagnosis and treatment. 
					
					 They called for arousing social concern over the importance of combating tuberculosis, gaining assistance for it, finding out all the tuberculosis cases and treating them in order to finally stamp out the disease.
					
					 There took place a contest of medical common sense related to tuberculosis.  
					
					 Then the participants looked round photos on display.
					
					 There were also hygienic information services in Pyongyang and provinces to mark the day.

articles.title: DPRK Adopts New Regulations for Environment Law
articles.content:
DPRK Adopts New Regulations for Environment Law
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The DPRK recently announced new regulations for the enforcement of Law on the Protection of Environment to replace the existing regulations adopted in Juche 100 (2011).
					 The newly-adopted regulations are aimed to strictly enforce the DPRK's Law on the Protection of Environment in order to spruce up the country's mountains and rivers, promote the people's health and provide them with hygienic and cultured life environment and better working conditions.
					
					 The regulations, consisting of 59 articles in 4 chapters, deal with the principles to be adhered to in the protection of environment and the matters arising in preserving and creating natural environment, preventing environmental pollution in advance and tightening the control over the environmental protection.

articles.title: Plastics Mat Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Plastics Mat Produced in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Building-materials Institute of the Architecture Engineering Branch under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK succeeded in beginning home production of plastic mat.
					 The mat, made with locally available raw materials, is springy, having the effect of massaging sole.
					
					 It is believed to be wisely used in sports facilities for its good elasticity and harmlessness.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Insulting Genuine Democracy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Insulting Genuine Democracy
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Washington is busy using media to spread "U.S.-style democracy" all over the world.
					 An article posted on Global Research, a website of the Institute for Globalization of Canada, on March 11 termed the U.S. a sham democratic country that works hard to make "democracy of its style" prevail in the world by setting in motion media to deceive the popular masses and maintain dictatorship for the privileged class. 
					
					 The U.S. has established and put under its control influential media to intensify censorship so that the truth behind the actions perpetrated by it such as the invasion of Iraq and the engineering of a coup in Ukraine may not be known to the public.
					
					 After singling out the ideological and cultural poisoning as one of the major channels for "spreading democracy", the U.S. has zealously used newspapers, magazines and other publications, internet, TV broadcasting services, economic exchange, etc. as levers for hyping "advantages of U.S.-style democracy." 
					
					 Media of the U.S. and other Western countries have put under their control three fourths of the world internet infrastructure to monitor most of world-wide information exchanges. By dint of their economic potential and latest sci-tech superiority, they monopolized huge modern information means to give wide publicity to reactionary ideas and culture and misinformation to meet their demands and interests.
					
					 They are gagging those calling for justice, misleading the public opinion as they please, cooking up lies in a bid to embellish the unpopular capitalist society.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that they are further intensifying the reactionary propaganda by using information means in an effort to tarnish the image of the countries calling for independence against imperialism and contain their rivals.
					
					 The primary goal of their news service is to attain ulterior purposes by shocking and confusing the mentality and psychology of peoples of those countries, instead of informing them of truth.
					
					 By intensifying smear campaigns, they toppled the government of Saddam Hussein who was the legitimate president of Iraq, a sovereign state, and the one of Gaddafi of Libya.  They are running the whole gamut of false propagandas in a bid to do harm to such anti-imperialist independent countries as the DPRK, Cuba, Iran and Venezuela.
					
					 They incited the anti-government forces in Syria and Ukraine to spark off civil wars and cause serious humanitarian crises.
					
					 Now "U.S.-style democracy" has become a source of trouble that causes political chaos, disputes and wars in various parts of the world.
					
					 The U.S. noisy call for "democracy" is a mockery of genuine democracy and an unpardonable challenge and insult to humankind.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Settling Accounts with Aggressors with Arms Only
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Settling Accounts with Aggressors with Arms Only
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article denounces the south Korean puppet forces for pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war, zealously following the U.S. hell-bent on the moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					 The U.S. and the puppet warmongers' hostile military actions are the root cause of disturbing peace and stability on the peninsula and increasing the danger of a nuclear war, it says, adding:
					
					 The Foal Eagle joint military drills now underway in south Korea are an all inclusive and three-dimensional nuclear test war with huge armed forces and equipment involved, different from Key Resolve. 
					
					 The danger of a war is increasing on the peninsula hour by hour due to their reckless military provocations. This is seriously threatening the lives and security of the Koreans.
					
					 The puppet forces are frantically fanning up the hostility towards the DPRK and the atmosphere of confrontation throughout the south Korean society by escalating Foal Eagle, making much fuss about "provocations" and "strong counteraction." 
					
					 It is self-evident that the DPRK can hardly discuss dialogue and improved inter-Korean relations as the puppet forces are hell-bent on confrontation with compatriots. 
					
					 There is no need to sit at a negotiating table with those going mad with confrontation and war. It is necessary to settle accounts with them with arms only.
					
					 It is the firm determination of the DPRK to mercilessly wipe out by force of arms the confrontational maniacs getting evermore frantic in their moves to ignite a war against it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare U.S. Intention to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare U.S. Intention to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Recently a spokesperson for the U.S. Department of Defense at a gathering said it is having sustained negotiations with the south Korean puppet forces to deploy THAAD in south Korea. Some days later the spokesperson feigned ignorance, saying it has not held any official negotiations.
					 Citing facts to expose that the U.S. has long made it a fait accompli to deploy THAAD in south Korea and made steady preparations, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says:
					
					 The U.S., facing a strong opposition of surrounding countries as regards the deployment of THAAD in south Korea, is running the whole gamut of gimmicks to conceal its real intention and attain its sinister goal.
					
					 The U.S. moves for the deployment of THAAD is a product of its military strategy to turn south Korea into an advanced base for invading Asia, hold strategic hegemony in Northeast Asia and contain big regional powers by counting on its unchallenged edge.
					
					 By deploying THAAD in south Korea, the U.S. seeks to lay a siege to Russia and China and thus hold a position for maximizing the effect of striking at the other parties while minimizing damage to it. 
					
					 But the U.S. is mistaken. No country will be taken in by its poor trick. It is clear that the deployment of THAAD in south Korea will be a seed causing a new Cold War in Asia-Pacific.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges S. Korean Puppet Minister of Unification to Control His Tongue
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges S. Korean Puppet Minister of Unification to Control His Tongue
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Hong Yong Phyo, newly-appointed puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, in an inaugural speech on March 16 malignantly slandered the DPRK, talking about "nuclear development of the north", "military and vocal provocations", "enmity" and "preconditions". Patronizing the "preparatory committee for unification", he jabbered that he would "do his best to register tangible successes". At a confirmation hearing earlier, he vociferated about the "north's nukes", "responsible step" and "reaction to possible contingency".
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 The thoughtless guy who had served Park Geun Hye at the inner room of Chongwadae let loose a spate of provocative remarks against the DPRK as soon as he was appointed minister of Unification. This reminds one of a newborn puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					 Hong Yong Phyo is a confrontational maniac who took the post without elementary experience of having negotiations with the north.
					
					 Therefore, one can easily guess at what the puppet regime's "policies toward the north" are aimed as such a guy played a "pivotal role" in cooking up the said policies including the "confidence-building process". The "preparatory committee for unification", a plot-breeding mechanism aimed at "unification through absorption" the dissolution of which is strongly demanded by people at home and abroad, was also set up by him at the behest of the present chief executive.
					
					 He uttered a spate of invectives against the DPRK, bragging of his clumsy title as minister of Unification, only to be ridiculed by the world.
					
					 This is tragicomedy that makes even the boiled head of a cow burst into a side-splitting laughter. He had better control his tongue.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Wild Ambition for "Unification of Social Systems"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Authorities' Wild Ambition for "Unification of Social Systems"
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Jong Jong Uk, vice-chairman for civilian affairs of the "preparatory committee for unification" of south Korea, on March 10 blustered that "the committee has a team for unification of social systems", "other bodies within the regime are studying unification of social systems" and that "unification through absorption is bound to happen despite the north's opposition". This is little short of confession made by Park Geun Hye's confidant Jong that the "preparatory committee for unification" is a plot-breeding organization for "unification of social systems" and "unification through absorption".
					 Not only the Koreans in the north but those in the south and abroad strongly demand Park Geun Hye apologize for those remarks and disband the committee.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The puppet group is making only lame excuses such as "regret."
					
					 The puppet Ministry of Unification in a commentary talked rubbish that "it has consistently pushed forward peaceful unification" and made a far-fetched assertion that "the south's preparations for the unification of social systems touted by the north are contrary to facts."
					
					 The puppet forces cried out for a "prompt response to the efforts for peaceful unification" but this is what the north has to say to them.
					
					 If they stand for peaceful unification, they have to prove it through such practical actions as abandoning sycophancy toward the U.S. and rolling back the misguided policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 However, the puppet group has neither disbanded the committee nor ousted Jong from office, an indication of its ulterior intention to go ahead with preparations for "unification of social systems" through the spurious plot-breeding mechanism.
					
					 Its scenario for "unification of social systems" is no more than a pipedream.
					
					 The south Korean authorities had better disband the committee and join in a march toward a broad avenue to independent reunification so that they may not regret belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Get Frantic with War Drills near Forefront
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Get Frantic with War Drills near Forefront
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The 8th Division of the south Korean puppet army announced that it would stage military drills in the area of Phochon City in Kyonggi Province and Cholwon County in Kangwon Province of south Korea from Mar. 22 to 28 against the backdrop of the on-going mad-cap Foal Eagle joint military drills that followed Key Resolve, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 Tanks, armored vehicles and other means for preemptive attack will reportedly be involved in the drills.
					
					 Earlier, the 30th Division of the puppet army announced a plan to stage a large-scale field mobile drill in Phaju of Kyonggi Province from Mar. 20 to 28.
					
					 Huge U.S. forces of aggression deployed in south Korea and the south Korean puppet forces are watching for a chance to ignite a war while frantically staging war drills to get familiar with procedures for a preemptive attack upon the DPRK.

articles.title: Actions against S. Korean Ruling Group's Crackdown Unabated
articles.content:
Actions against S. Korean Ruling Group's Crackdown Unabated
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- South Korean people from all walks of life are staging ceaseless actions against the puppet group's crackdown upon the scattering of leaflets against Park Geun Hye.
					 35 civic and public organizations in North Jolla Province including the North Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions, the North Jolla Provincial Peace and Human Rights Solidarity and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a press conference outside the building of the North Jolla Provincial Police Agency in protest against the puppet group's crackdown.
					
					 In a press release, the organizations said that the act of forcibly searching Pak Song Su's house and printing office for the mere reason that he scattered leaflets against the Park's regime is a serious human rights abuse as it is the suppression of the freedom of expression.
					
					 The organizations urged Park Geun Hye and the regime to lend ears to the voices of the people and stop the crackdown upon leaflet scattering actions.
					
					 Meanwhile, Pak Song Su, who is subject to suppression due to the leaflet scattering action against Park Geun Hye, distributed among the participants in the press conference leaflets critical of the moves to obliterate democracy which have escalated since the present regime came to power, declaring that what he did was just and he would continue his struggle in the future, too.

articles.title: Bereaved Families Stage Actions Abroad to Probe Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
Bereaved Families Stage Actions Abroad to Probe Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster staged actions abroad denouncing the puppet group for shunning the probe into truth behind the disaster, according to the south Korean internet paper Oh My News on Mar. 17.
					 They held round-table talks in Chicago, the U.S. on Mar. 15 calling for probing the truth behind the disaster and staged a campaign to send a protest letter to the puppet south Korean ambassador to the U.S. next day.
					
					 Their actions aroused support and concern of Koreans in the U.S. and media.
					
					 They declared they would conduct such activities as round-table talks to probe the truth behind the disaster and an exhibition for letting people know about the dream of those children who died in the ferry sinking incident in Toronto, Canada from Mar. 20.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea was formed on March 17 to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					 According to an official notice on its formation, Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the above-said association, and other 17 personages of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea and Songun politics were enrolled in the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to widely introduce the noble revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Il Sung and hold political and cultural events including seminar on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Khabarovsk of Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Khabarovsk of Russia
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A Khabarovsk territorial preparatory committee of Russia for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on March 20. 
					 Alexander Fedosov, deputy prime minister of the Khabarovsk Territory Administration who is chairman of the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold multifarious political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Honored in Syria
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Honored in Syria
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A Syrian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on March 17. 
					 The director of the Higher Education Department of the Regional Leadership of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to give wide publicity to the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung and hold diverse political and cultural events including round-table talks on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Belarus
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Belarus
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A Belarusian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on March 19.
					 L. Shukolinikov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus who doubles as chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the undying feats of the President and organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Germany
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Germany formed a preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) on March 18.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the Communist Party of Germany, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the undying exploits Kim Il Sung performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of human independence and the greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un from March 18 to April 15.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovenia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Slovenia
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Maribor City on March 18. 
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung in the capital city and local areas from March 18 to April 16 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Ecuador
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Ecuador
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- An Ecuadorian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Quito on March 18. 
					 Osvaldo Larriva Alvarado, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Il Sung in the capital city and local areas on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by German Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by German Political Figure
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The great Comrade Kim Il Sung is not only the founder of socialist Korea but also the world political elder who brightly indicated the path to be followed by the progressive humankind.
					 At an inaugural ceremony of a preparatory committee for celebrating his birth anniversary held by the Communist Party of Germany on March 18, Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the party, said this, and went on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung liberated the country from the colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists seventy years ago and founded the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He also led the hard-fought war against the U.S. and its followers to victory and wisely led the building of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 A lot of famous works published by him are the textbooks of life and struggle which brightly indicate the path to be followed by the Korean people and world progressives.
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist fortress.
					
					 Today the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward to completion their revolutionary cause.
					
					 The Communist Party of Germany will as ever conduct more dynamic activities for supporting the just cause of the Korean people together with the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Personages of Guinea, Ethiopia, Angola
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Personages of Guinea, Ethiopia, Angola
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Lectures and round-table talks took place in Guinea, Ethiopia and Angola on March 17 and 18 with the approach of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun). 
					 The commander of the First Commando of Almami Samori Toure Barracks of the Guinean Army in a lecture said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was a great revolutionary who devoted all his life to the prosperity of the country and the cause of global independence. 
					
					 The President indicated the way for mankind to follow just as the sun shines the world and built the flower garden of love for the people to embrace them all. 
					
					 Thanks to the President who devoted his all to the people, the most popular policies have been enforced in the DPR of Korea. 
					
					 The world people were deeply impressed by his noble personality and kindness. 
					
					 He will live forever as the sun in the hearts of mankind. 
					
					 The vice-director of an Ethiopian hospital said:
					
					 The Day of the Sun is the most important holiday not only for the Korean people but also for the world progressives. 
					
					 The President was a great thinker and theoretician and philosopher. 
					
					 His works are an encyclopedia indicating a bright way not only for the Korean people but also for the progressive mankind. 
					
					 I wish the Korean people bigger successes in their drive for building a thriving nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 The head of the special project room of the Presidency of Angola highly praised the sacred revolutionary career and undying exploits of the President who devoted his all to the happiness of the people, regarding it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by UK Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by UK Body on Its Website
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Forever in High Esteem and Accomplish His Cause" on its website on March 18. 
					 The work, published on Oct. 16, Juche 83 (1994), indicates the tasks and ways for defending the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and accomplishing it to the last, including the issue of consolidating the party and strengthening the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses, the issue of thoroughly carrying out the party's revolutionary economic strategy and the issue of reinforcing the People's Army and establishing the social traits of attaching importance to the military affairs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre nueva fabrica de piensos del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre nueva fabrica de piensos del EPC
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Piensos de Peces, construida nuevamente por el EPC.
					Al contemplar el panorama de la fabrica, dijo que se ha sentado la base para producir y suministrar por cuenta propia los piensos necesarios a la piscicultura y se abrieron las posibilidades de cumplir los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes se desvelaban por mejorar la vida alimentaria de los militares y habitantes mediante el desarrollo de piscicultura.
					
					Solo con ver la parte exterior de la fabrica, se puede conocer la firme determinacion y los grandes esfuerzos por desarrollar la piscicultura, senalo.
					
					Muy complacido apunto que el EPC demostro otra vez su modo de trabajo en el cumplimiento de legados de los grandes lideres y las politicas del Partido.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el panorama de la fabrica, el Mariscal averiguo en detalles el estado de produccion recorriendo varios puntos.
					
					Se puso contento de que se produjeran varios piensos hechos con harinas de camarones pequenos, Ammodytes personalus, boqueron, Arctoscopus japonicus y otros pescados para la cria de esturion, truchas irisadas y Ryongjong-o (una especie de carpa).
					
					El EPC se puso al frente de la produccion de piensos de peces hechos con materiales domesticos, dijo y agrego que la fabrica posibilitara criar en grandes cantidades los peces de varias especies con los piensos producidos en nuestro pais.
					
					El Comandante Supremo presento las tareas que incumben a la fabrica.
					
					Subrayo que se debe prestar mucha atencion a la modernizacion de la fabrica y al establecimiento en el nivel mas alto de la cultura de produccion y vida y ordeno instalar mas equipos modernos, automatizar los procesos de seleccion, procesamiento, embalaje y transporte de los pescados y reforestar el recinto de la fabrica.
					
					Para el pleno funcionamiento de la fabrica, deben suministrar normalmente los pescados para la produccion de piensos, tomar perfectas medidas para impedir la putrefaccion de los piensos y establecer el cientifico metodo de produccion al preparar bien el personal tecnico y elevar el nivel tecnico de los empleados.
					
					Al final, se retrato con los empleados expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos cumpliran bien sus tareas.

articles.title: Departamento de Politica del CDN reitera la posicion de la RPDC sobre "medidas del 24 de mayo"
articles.content:
Departamento de Politica del CDN reitera la posicion de la RPDC sobre "medidas del 24 de mayo"
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- Las autoridades surcoreanas lanzan con furia la campana conflictiva anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea acusandola todavia de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan".
					Ese incidente y las consiguientes "medidas del 24 de mayo" fueron expresion coherente de la conducta anti-reunificacion, encaminada a invalidar la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, aprobadas entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Las actuales autoridades surcoreanas siguen chismeando que para cancelar las "medidas del 24 de mayo", son necesarias las muestras del "cambio de actitud" de alguien, tales como "reconocimiento", "disculpa", "expresion de lastima" sobre el incidente de "Cheonan". 
					
					Para colmo, insisten hasta en plantear como primera agenda del dialogo el tema de eliminacion de las "medidas" en cuestion.
					
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC publico el dia 23 una declaracion en que expuso de nuevo la siguiente posicion de principios de la RPDC sobre aquellas "medidas": 
					
					Primero, demandamos invariablemente la cancelacion inmediata de las infames "medidas del 24 de mayo", inventadas pretextando el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan". 
					
					Es que las "medidas" se basan en la injusta insistencia en que el accidente de "Cheonan" fue "obra del Norte" si bien la RPDC no tiene nada que ver. 
					
					La falta de pruebas justas produce las medidas injustas. 
					
					Segundo, las autoridades surcoreanas deben conocer claramente que no sera aceptada nunca su injusta demanda de que se debe haber la "disculpa" y "expresion de lastima" de alguien antes de la eliminacion de las "medidas del 24 de mayo". 
					
					Cualquiera que pretenda demandarnos "pedir perdon" por el caso de "Cheonan" y discutir en el dialogo las "medidas del 24 de mayo", esto sera intolerable burla y declaracion de enfrentamiento para la RPDC. 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, deben conocer que han de pasar a la accion de cancelar las "medidas".
					
					Tercero, tenemos la invariable posicion de comenzar de inmediato, si es necesario, la reinvestigacion para esclarecer de manera cientifica la verdad del caso de "Cheonan" que produjo las infames "medidas del 24 de mayo". 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras la solucion del problema, deben tomar la decision de aceptar todas las propuestas de la RPDC presentadas para resolver el problema de "Cheonan". 
					
					Si les es dificil hacerlo, deben traer a Phanmunjom o cualquier otro lugar acordado todas las pruebas materiales del incidente. Entonces, daremos a todo el mundo la aclaracion inmediata de lo ocurrido realmente. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben olvidar ni un momento que si continuan hablando de las "medidas del 24 de mayo" vinculando injustamente a la RPDC con el hundimiento de "Cheonan", seran tratadas como segunda horda de traidores de Lee Myung Bak y cadaveres vivos.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju envia mensaje de condolencias a premier de Singapur
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju envia mensaje de condolencias a premier de Singapur
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju envio el dia 23 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo de la Republica de Singapur, Lee Hsien Long.
					En la misiva el remitente senalo que al recibir la noticia triste del fallecimiento de Su Excelencia Lee Kuan Yew, fundador de la Republica de Singapur y amigo intimo del  pueblo coreano, expresa las mas profundas condolencias al destinatario y sus familiares.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza la "democracia al estilo norteamericano"
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza la "democracia al estilo norteamericano"
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- Ahora Estados Unidos moviliza los medios de comunicacion masiva en su propaganda de la "democracia al estilo norteamericano".
					Al respecto, la pagina web del Instituto de Globalizacion de Canada "Global Research" revelo el dia 11 que EE.UU. es el pais seudodemocratico que recurre a la campana mediatica para divulgar en el mundo la "democracia al estilo norteamericano", engana a las masas populares y mantiene la dictadura a favor de los privilegiados. 
					
					EE.UU. fundo y controla los medios mas grandes e influyentes para que las masas populares no pudieran conocer la verdad de sus crimenes como la invasion a Irak y el golpe de Estado en Ucrania. 
					
					Considerando la penetracion ideologica y cultural como una de las vias principales de "proliferacion de la democracia", utiliza los periodicos, revistas y otras publicaciones, Internet, la TV, el intercambio economico y otros espacios en la propaganda de las "superioridades" de la "democracia norteamericana". 
					
					Los medios de prensa norteamericanos y occidentales controlan la mayor parte del intercambio mediatico internacional tomando en sus manos tres cuartas partes de la infraestructura del Internet. Ateniendose a la superioridad de la capacidad economica y la ciencia y tecnica ultramodernas, monopolizan modernos medios de informacion y propagan en gran medida la idea y cultura reaccionarias y las informaciones tergiversadas segun sus demandas e intereses. 
					
					Reprimen las voces de justicia, inducen en error la opinion publica, inventan las noticias falsificadas y embellecen la sociedad capitalista de caracter antipopular. 
					
					En particular, intensifican la ofensiva mediatica reaccionaria para mantener a rayas a los paises independientes y antiimperialistas y los rivales potenciales. 
					
					Con la ofensiva mediatica intrigante, EE.UU. derroco a los presidentes legitimos de los Estados soberanos, entre otros, Saddam Hussein de Iraq y Gaddafi de Libia.
					
					Lanza ahora la demagogia contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Cuba, Iran, Venezuela y otros paises independientes y antiimperialistas. 
					
					Recientemente, desato las guerras civiles en Siria y Ucrania instigando a las fuerzas antigubernamentales y causo asi grave crisis humanitaria. 
					
					Hoy dia, la "democracia norteamericana" produce el disturbio politico, los conflictos y las guerras por doquier del mundo. 
					
					El alegato de EE.UU. sobre la "democracia" es un insulto a la verdadera democracia y desafio intolerable a la humanidad.
